name: GKDecisionTree
desc: A data structure that models a set of specific questions, their possible answers, and the actions that follow from a series of answers.

items.name: init(attribute: NSObjectProtocol)
items.desc: Creates a decision tree starting with the specified initial attribute to test.

items.name: var rootNode: GKDecisionNode?
items.desc: The decision node at the root of the decision tree, representing the first attribute to test.

items.name: init(examples: [[NSObjectProtocol]], actions: [NSObjectProtocol], attributes: [NSObjectProtocol])
items.desc: Creates an automatically learned decision tree using the specified attributes, example items, and actions.

items.name: func findAction(forAnswers: [AnyHashable : NSObjectProtocol]) -> NSObjectProtocol?
items.desc: Searches the decision tree, following the branches corresponding to each of the specified answers, and returns the resulting action object.

items.name: var randomSource: GKRandomSource
items.desc: The randomizer to be used when evaluating parts of the tree that branch randomly.

items.name: func export(to: URL, error: Error?) -> Bool
